additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: SUGAR, 25% JUICE FROM CONCENTRATE (13% LEMON, 12% LIME), WATER, NATURAL FLAVOURS, FOOD ACIDS (CITRIC, SODIUM CITRATE), NATURAL COLOURS (VEGETABLE JUICE, MALT EXTRACT), PRESERVATIVE (211), VEGETABLE GUM (XANTHAN).

description: Fresh fruity taste of lemonade combined with distinct lime characters and delicate blends of bitters, herbs and spices. True to our tradition of uncompromising craft and purity, our Lemon Lime & Bitters Cordial is widely regarded as one of Australia's best.
name: Lemon Lime & Bitters Cordial
